title: New Year's Message to President Chiang Chung-cheng of the Republic of China.
text:
I THANK Your Excellency in my own name and on behalf of my fellow countrymen for your courteous new year greetings which are most heartily reciprocated.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Chiang Chung-cheng, The President of the Chinese Republic, Nanking, China]
